EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Fidel Benitez (1344002288.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Fidel Benitez (1344002288.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Fidel, Thanks for reaching out and giving me the update. Congrats on the new company – how exciting! If you ever need to place 1099 consultants and you need a compliant way to pay them you know our number J Take care and good luck! Sara From: Fidel Benitez [mailto:fidelbenitez.us@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, August 02, 2012 3:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Fidel Benitez Hello Sara, Many thanks of the follow up! I am happy to share that following my entrepreneurial spirit, I decided to incorporate my own staffing, consulting and executive search firm. At Andival Group we specialize in highly skilled professional servicing the Energy Sector. At this stage, we are trying to set the foundations for the company and expect to start placing candidates in early Q4. I will certainly sign up for the brief and will keep in contact. Below my updated details Many thanksFidel Fidel BenitezPresidentAndival Group10777 Westheimer Suite 1100Houston, TX 77042, USAT: 713.785.1136 F: 713.785.1139 M: 832.279.4533Email: fidel.benitez@andivalgroup.com <mailto:fidel.benitez@andivalgroup.com> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message. On Aug 2, 2012, at 2:17 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Dear Fidel, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yOTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg5OTQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4OTI2MDImZW1haWxpZD1maWRlbGJlbml0ZXoudXNAZ21haWwuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0yMDAyNi0xMTE0OTk3LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56u0pUK6xlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
